name: COOOP
description:
COOOP is a project I worked on for 3 months before abandonning it to get back to LAZERS Reflex a year ago, so don't expect a ton of polish and content.

You can play with up to 3 friends to complete the 10 available levels together to unlock new skins !

Or if you don't have any friend, you can play the levels alone but you won't get any reward for it and you won't be able to complete most of them anyway.

This game is playable using CONTROLLERS ONLY !
It uses an early version of UNInput which wasn't stable yet if I recall correctly.
The screenshots you can see are from the 1 player mode.
